Summaries.eng: A diverse team of idiosyncratic people works at the Line Corporation. In this office life can be difficult, but never boring.
Summaries.jpn: Tokui taishitsu no hitobito no tayōna chīmu ga LineCorporation de hataraite imasu. Kono ofisu de no seikatsu wa muzukashī kamo shiremasenga, kesshite taikutsude wa arimasen.

Boss!  I Can't Hold It In!
No Food Was Wasted in the Making of This Episode
Moon Is Happy to Answer Any Question
A Trip to Hawaii for Two
Who Wants to Be a Zillionaire?
Oh Yeah!  Let's Go to Atami!
The Marvelous Pudding That Always Sells Out!
The Private Life of a Capable Man
A Little-Known Horror Called Back Pain
A Little-Known Horror Called Money Issues
A Little-Known Horror Called Social Hierarchy
The Making of The Last Salaryman
